values: I got your card today!!  It is so cute!!!!  Thank you so much!!

I'm on vacation this week ( I had too use it by June 15 or I would have lost it) and I have tons of stuff to do to get Billy ready for College.  Friday we are going to Valdosta for orientation. 

Right now I'm trying to fix his birth certificate that was issued with the wrong year.  It show's him being born in 1992 instead of 1991.  So we went to the Social Security office to get it straight.  I took his german birth certificate, shot records (showing that he got shots in 1991) his german passport, my passport that has him in it. 
The lady looks at us and asks if he has a social security number and we give it to her.  She looks at the computer and says:  Nope...he was born in 1992!!!!!  Wtf??  I just showed you tons of info and you look in your computer and you establish that he was born in 1992 based on what?  The wrong information that we are trying to get corrected????  Sigh...
After that she told us that she can't help us and gave me a sheet that tells me what to do.   Basically I have to mail everything to Washington and hope that someone there is brighter than she is.

Problem number 2 is getting him his shot for Mengingitis (sp?).  Our Dr. doesnt do that so now I have to find one that does or pay $113 at the health department.  And nope my insurance wont reimburse it. 

I'm also looking into possibly moving end of July....

 

I hope that everyone has a great weekend!!

Last nite for the first time ever, Billy's Highschool took home the state champion football title!!

 

Go Northside Eagles!!!
Posted some pic's for you guys from Billy's christmas concert!!  The little girl is his girlfriend!!
